anyOf.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

till_timestamp.description: Timestamp till which Rewards will be accrued. No staking rewards are accrued beyond this timestamp

asset_info.description:
Represents the type of an fungible asset

Each **asset info** instance can be one of three variants:

- Native SDK coins. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the denomination. - CW20 tokens. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the contract address. - CW1155 tokens. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the contract address and token ID.
